articles.title: Covid-19 spike in Luton is 'alarming' with significant numbers of deaths, says council - Luton Today
articles.description: Covid-19 cases in Luton are increasing at a "dramatically worrying" speed according to health officials - with fears the town could become the number one blackspot in the East of England.
articles.content:
Evidence shows that infection rates are already at over 250 per 100,000 and look set to reach 300 per 100,000.
The situation has been described as "extremely serious" and it would take Luton far hig… [+2120 chars]

articles.content: I think theres a big problem with our current philosophy of contract tracing and quarantining, and that is its all based around a big stick that beats people up. I dont think we are looking at it as … [+888 chars]

articles.content:
Investigations into deaths in police custody should be treated with the same urgency as homicide investigations, according to an independent review.
